猺字的基本解释

猺
yáo
〔青猺〕哺乳动物，大小像猫，四肢较短，体背灰棕色，栖息山林中，吃谷物、果实等，肉味鲜美，毛皮可以做衣物。亦称“果子狸”、“花面狸”。
〔黄猺〕即“青鼬”，哺乳动物，体长圆形，四肢短，耳朵大，栖息树林中，捕食鼠、鸟等，毛皮可做衣服。

猺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yáo］
［《廣韻》餘昭切，平宵，以。］
(1)兽名。
(2)旧时指瑶族。

猺字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　猺； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页716第06
【廣韻】【集韻】?餘招切，音遙。【廣韻】獸名。　又獏猺，狗種也。

暂无。

猺
Basic explanation of words
猺
yáo
〔青猺〕 Mammals, the size of cats, short limbs, gray-brown body back, living in the mountains and forests, eating grains, fruits, etc., the meat is delicious, and the fur can be used as clothing. Also known as "civet cat" and "flower-faced raccoon dog".
〔黄猺〕 means "green weasel", a mammal with an oblong body, short limbs and large ears. It lives in the woods and preys on rats and birds. The fur can be used as clothing.
猺
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yáo］
["Guangyun" Yu Zhaoqie, Ping Xiao, to. ]
(1) The animal name.
(2) In the old days, it referred to the Yao nationality.
猺

[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? I move and cut, sound away. 【Guangyun】The name of the animal.　It’s a tapir, a dog breed.
